original_title: 陰陽路十五之客似魂來 Yin yang lu 15: Ke si hun lai
overview: Ngau, a cook in the Hong Kong countryside, is trying to save his son from a vengeful evil spirit who was wronged years ago by Ngau's past life. In the process, Ngau seeks the help of Mrs. Bud Lung, who can communicate with the other side.
title: Troublesome Night 15
